xecure.servlet
Class XecureSessionCtl

java.lang.Object
  xecure.servlet.XecureSessionCtl
public class XecureSessionCtl
extends java.lang.Object

The XecureSessionCtl class controls XecureWeb session properties.
This class provides several methods for session attachment and timeout.

Since:
7.0 v016
